actionCalls.description: Call apex method to get Products available for options chosen on previous flow screens.
actionCalls.name: COMM_GetProductPrice

assignments.description: Clear Airport List of values to ensure it doesn't repeat them.
assignments.name: COMM_Assignment_EmptyAirportList

assignments.description: Assign Park Pricing and Name of the Park to handle.

assignments.name: COMM_SetAccountRelatedOnUser_1

decisions.description: Check if Sub-Category is already available for output.
decisions.name: COMM_AlreadyContainsSubCategory
decisions.label: Already Contains Sub-Category?

decisions.description: Check if Case and Subscription are related.
decisions.name: COMM_CaseIsRelatedOnSubscription
decisions.label: Case is related on Subscription?

decisions.description: Condition to check if there are Subscription records to create.
decisions.name: COMM_DoExistSubscriptionsToCreate
decisions.label: Do exist Subscriptions to Create?

decisions.description: Check if a Product has definition.
decisions.name: COMM_IsProductDefined
decisions.label: Is Product defined?

decisions.description: Check if the Park on the loop is the selected in screen.
decisions.name: COMM_IsTheSelectedPark
decisions.label: Is the Selected Park?

decisions.description: Check if the Park on the loop is the selected in screen.
decisions.name: COMM_IsTheSelectedPark_0
decisions.label: Is the Selected Park?

decisions.description: Check if there is additional Subscriptions to create.
decisions.name: COMM_IsToCreateRecord
decisions.label: Is to Create Record?

decisions.description: Check if the availability of chosen park is less than the park availability.
decisions.name: COMM_ParkAvailabilityLessThanChosen
decisions.label: Park availability less than chosen?

decisions.description: Check if retrieved Product is available in Portal.
decisions.name: COMM_ProductIsAvailableInSubscriptionPortal
decisions.label: Product is available in Subscription Portal?

decisions.description: Check if there are parks for the selected sub-category.
decisions.name: COMM_ThereAreParksForTheSelectedSubCategory
decisions.label: There are Parks for the selected Sub-Category?

decisions.description: Condition to check if there are products available for the previous chosen option on screen.
decisions.name: COMM_ThereAreProductsAvailable

decisions.description: Condition to check if there is a Card Product for the previous chosen Park.
decisions.name: COMM_ThereIsACardRelatedToTheSelectedProduct
decisions.label: There is a Card related to the selected Product?

decisions.description: Check if an Account related to the User on flow execution context exists.
decisions.name: COMM_UserAccountFound
decisions.label: User Account found?

decisions.description: Check if User in flow context has a related Effective Account ID.
decisions.name: COMM_UserEffectiveccountIsPopulated
decisions.label: User Effective Account is populated?

decisions.name: Decision_CheckIfParentProductIsActive
decisions.label: Check if Parent Product is Active

Flow.description: Screen to flow for New Subscription Request creation.

formulas.description: Formula field with Automatic Renewal Account definition.
formulas.name: COMM_AccountAutomaticRenewal

formulas.description: Get actual month in text format.
formulas.name: COMM_ActualMonth

formulas.description: End Date calculation based on periodicity.
formulas.name: COMM_EndDate
formulas.expression: CASE({!COMM_Periodicity}, 'Monthly', ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),1), 'Quarterly', ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),3), 'Half Yearly', ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),6), 'Yearly', ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),12), TODAY())

formulas.description: End date calculation based on periodicity.
formulas.name: COMM_EndDate2
formulas.expression: CASE({!COMM_ChosenPeriodicity}, 'Monthly', TODAY(), 'Quarterly', ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),2), 'Half Yearly', ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),5), 'Yearly', ADDMONTHS(TODAY(),11), TODAY())

formulas.description: Get last day of end month of subscription.
formulas.name: COMM_LastDayEndMonth

formulas.description: Calculate the price of a Subscription and related Card.
formulas.name: COMM_SubscriptionPrice

Flow.label: Create New Subscription Request

loops.description: Loop products returned from apex action that have availability in commerce.
loops.name: COMM_LoopAvailableProductsWithPrices
loops.label: Loop Available Products With Prices

loops.name: COMM_LoopParks
loops.label: Loop Parks

loops.description: Loop Parks available to choose for the Selected Sub-Category.
loops.name: COMM_LoopParks_0
loops.label: Loop Parks

recordLookups.name: COMM_GetRunningUser

recordLookups.name: COMM_GetSubcriptionProducts

recordLookups.name: COMM_GetSubscriptionRequestCaseRecordType

recordLookups.description: Get Account details related on flow context User.
recordLookups.name: COMM_GetUserAccount

recordRollbacks.description: Action to rollback records to be inserted if any error occurs.
recordRollbacks.name: COMM_RollbackRecordsInError
recordRollbacks.label: Rollback records in Error

screens.description: Screen with picklist option choices for Airport and Periodicity related on Subscription.
screens.name: COMM_AirportPeriodicitySelectionScreen
screens.label: Airport / Periodicity Selection Screen

screens.description: Screen warning that a card product do not exist for the options chosen on previous screen.
screens.name: COMM_CardNotAvailableScreen
screens.label: Card not available Screen

fields.name: COMM_SingleSubscriptionConfirmation
fields.fieldText: {!$Label.COMM_SUBSCRIPTION_CONFIRMATION}

fields.name: COMM_MultiSubscriptionConfirmation
fields.fieldText: {!COMM_QuantityOfSubscription} {!$Label.COMM_SUBSCRIPTION_MULTICONFIRMATION}

screens.description: Screen warning that park availability do not exist for the options chosen on previous screen.
screens.name: COMM_ParkNotAvailableScreen
screens.label: Park not available Screen

screens.description: Screen with Parks available for the chosen Product.
screens.name: COMM_ParkSelectionScreen
screens.label: Park Selection Screen

screens.description: Screen warning that parks do not exist for the options chosen on previous screen.
screens.name: COMM_ParksNotAvailableScreen
screens.label: Parks not available Screen

screens.description: Screen warning that products do not exist for the options chosen on previous screen.
screens.name: COMM_ProductsNotAvailableScreen
screens.label: Products not available Screen

screens.description: Screen with Sub-Categories of Product available for Subscription and related quantity definition.
screens.name: COMM_SubCategoryQuantitySelectionScreen
screens.label: Sub-Category / Quantity Selection Screen

fields.name: COMM_SubscriptionTotalNoCard
fields.fieldText: {!COMM_QuantityOfSubscription} - {!COMM_ChoosenProductName} : {!COMM_QuantityOfSubscription} * {!COMM_ChoosenProductPrice} €

fields.name: COMM_CardTotal
fields.fieldText: {!COMM_QuantityOfSubscription} - {!$Label.COMM_SUBSCRIPTION_CARD}: {!COMM_QuantityOfSubscription} * {!COMM_GetCardPrice.UnitPrice} €

screens.description: Screen to define the details of user to which relate Subscription.
screens.name: COMM_SubscriptionUserDetailScreen
screens.label: Subscription User Detail Screen

variables.description: Text variable with values where product is available.
variables.name: COMM_AvailableIn

variables.description: Variable with Count of Products defined with availability.
variables.name: COMM_AvailableProductsCount

variables.description: Store selected product availability from OMS.
variables.name: COMM_ChosenProductAvailability

variables.description: Variable with Payment methods available for Account in context
variables.name: COMM_FilteredAccountPaymentMethod

variables.description: List of Airports that exist in Account and Contact
variables.name: COMM_filteredAirportsList

variables.description: List of Airports available in User's Contact Record
variables.name: COMM_filteredContactAirports

variables.description: Record variable to store information about the flow running user.
variables.name: COMM_flowContextUser

variables.description: Store Product Payment Method as text.
variables.name: COMM_ProductPaymentMethod

variables.description: Account related on User in flow context.
variables.name: COMM_UserAccount
